alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:01AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gillespie and Llano Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 501 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prairie Mountain, or 17 miles north of Fredericksburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Llano, Gainesville, Horseshoe Bay, Baby Head, Prairie Mountain, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Crabapple, Valley Spring, Oxford and Sunrise Beach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
